name: Fluence
introduce: Fluence is a Web 3 native computing platform to develop and host applications, interfaces and backends on permissionless peer-to-peer networks. Fluence can read data from any public data source—IPFS, Filecoin, Arweave, Ceramic, Ethereum, Solana, Flow, etc.—compute over it, and store the newly computed data back in any of these repositories.
